channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report E-2023100440
item.description:
Report E-2023100440

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-16T18:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: MERIDIAN
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the packaging was defective on one of the poly 5 gallon pail of temp det (un3266) and that 5 gallons had been released. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
